name: Seven Portraits 1/7 Robert A. Heinlein
description:
Mixed-media, 2048 × 2048, 2021

Robert A. Heinlein
T Alto Cruz 35
8016-104 TWYdxceD
Favorite color:Silver

I've lived in the parallel universe for 20 years now and I love it. It's beautiful. The universe you live in would normally be a boring place. There are people you know, neighbors come and go. You work, you play, you fall in love. You start a family, have children, and raise them on your own. You will have a life and accomplish something. But you will not do any of those things. Instead, you live in this ever-changing world.
The world I have lived in has been the most exciting world I have known. I could have lived anywhere. I am fortunate to live in a place where things move quickly. It's like flying in the sky. There is a lot more freedom. People are younger, richer, more interesting, and more diverse than in the normal universe. It is a place where people do things they cannot do in the normal universe.
